title: Unexpected event type at HttpStream._handle_event: Expected Start|HttpEvent, got ConnectionClosed.
body:
```
[2021-07-15T15:24:23.212732] 127.0.0.1:58162: mitmproxy has crashed!
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/server.py", line 279, in server_event
    for command in layer_commands:
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 168, in handle_event
    command = next(command_generator)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 255, in handle_event
    yield from self._handle(event)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 168, in handle_event
    command = next(command_generator)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 731, in _handle_event
    yield from self.event_to_child(handler, event)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 740, in event_to_child
    for command in child.handle_event(event):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 135, in handle_event
    command_generator = self._handle_event(event)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/proxy/utils.py", line 23, in _check_event_type
    raise AssertionError(
AssertionError: Unexpected event type at HttpStream._handle_event: Expected Start|HttpEvent, got ConnectionClosed(connection=Server({'id': 'â€¦901845', 'address': ('eu-tlp07.kameleoon.eu', 443), 'state': <ConnectionState.CLOSED: 0>, 'timestamp_start': 1626355462.6600146, 'timestamp_tcp_setup': 1626355462.9977949, 'peername': ('178.63.14.120', 443), 'sockname': ('172.25.2.193', 58175)})).
```
